name: The Pet Cat Who Does A Minuet
name_original: The Pet Cat Who Does A Minuet
description:
Set in the universe of Entropic Summons, but a narrative within its own context... another facet of the archetypal world, where psychology is on the mind, but also... a cat will make all its pomposity known!

An action RPG, connected to a lengthier (turn-based RPG) Entropic Summons, to complement its plain novel form A Snowed Abode (same characters as ES, written in a descriptive format, with an added comedic narration), related to a VN (games all a different story, in the same universe).

Entropic Summons is the medium which has the most narrative so far, its novel half-way there; this action RPG is short (but mostly complete); the VN still a prototype.
